title: Beautiful, large 1x1 - Floor to Ceiling Windows
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 629 Sq.
I'm Cue, the boutique apartment community on the corner of E. Pine Street and Harvard Ave. in Seattle's famous Capitol Hill neighborhood.
It means I'm hip yet historic: I may have new bones, but I haven't forgotten my local roots.
As promised, I'm bringing neighborhood staple Bill's Off Broadway back - bigger and better!
It means I offer personalized touches throughout my 90 one-bedroom apartment homes.

It also means I'm located in a chic location that's close to Downtown Seattle, Seattle Central Community College, and walking distance to a hot-zone of hangouts for foodies, bar-flies, and music-lovers.
I'm unique, paying attention to every little detail so I stand out from the crowd.

You'll need to see it for yourself, but here's a little taste of what makes me so special: Taking cue from the neighborhood (pun intended), my award-winning architectural design features contemporary hard surface flooring, designer kitchens with quartz countertops, lots of storage and custom closet organizers, built-in bedroom storage, fully-tiled glass showers, and European fixtures.
Daily errands do not require a car
Microsoft Connector pick up a few blocks away or take the 545 straight to campus.

Wired for fiber internet with Wave G or Comcast, Entry Coat Closets, Track Lighting, Stainless Steel Appliances, Washer and Dryer in every unit, Fully-tiled walk in glass showers and European Hardware, Contemporary Metal Patina hard surface flooring throughout the home, Built-in Storage shelves in Bedroom, Designer kitchens with quartz countertops with under-mount sinks in microwaves and ovens, Custom closet organizers, Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
Bocce ball, BBQ grill, and fire pit – invite your friends for an impromptu rooftop deck party.
Just bring refreshments!, Free Bike storage fix-it and wash-down area.
Zumba to your own beat, or straight-up pump it up., Private Lounge – Sure you can use it to lounge around, but better to host a party (or pre-party) here.
Restricted dog breeds: Akita, Spitz, Chow Chow, Pit Bull, Doberman Pinscher, Rottweiler, Malamute, Presa Canario and Wolf-Hybrid.
Use the link below for more details:
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
